translations: 到处翻寻，检查（rummage 的过去分词形式）

sentences.sentence: I opened the fridge and rummaged around.
I rummaged through the contents of the box until I found the book I wanted.
sentences.translation: 我把箱子都翻遍了才找到我要的书。

sentences.sentence: I rummaged through the drawers and came up with Amanda's folder. "Here we are."
sentences.translation: 我翻遍了抽屉，终于发现了阿曼达的活页夹。“找到了。”
